means: 美化，装饰( beautify的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Accounts of this series of battles have been beautified.
sentence.Network_cn: 有关这一系列战役的叙述已被加以美化.

sentence.Network_en: Her face beautified at the encouraging news.
sentence.Network_cn: 听到那令人振奋的消息后,她的面孔更加动人.

sentence.Network_en: The wealth of her graces was inexhaustible -- she beautified the commonest action.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那优美的风度千姿百态, -- 她给最平常的一举一动都赋予一种美感.

list.abs: 把几个句子翻译成... ... 释放压力 release press 美化环境 beautify environment 为古城增添新貌 lend the old city a new look.
widely used in the overpass , building outline , etc , is the ideal light beautify cities .广泛用于立交桥，大厦，轮廓等场合，是美化城市的理想光源。
you can personalize the menu , there are icons and color add the menu , in order to beautify your interface . very useful , very convenient !可以个性化你的菜单，添加有图标和颜色的菜单，从而美化你的界面。很实用，很方便！
If he were free , he would beautify the courtyard ., 如果他现在有空 , 他就会美化这个庭院.

entry.def: If you beautify something, you make it look more beautiful.

example.ex: Claire worked to beautify the garden.
